name: Disney Infinity 3.0
description:
Disney Infinity 3.0 is an action, adventure, fighting and puzzle game developed by Avalanche Software and Heavy Iron Studios. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Disney Interactive.
Disney Infinity 3.0 is available on iOS, Android, Wii U and Xbox 360.
Chuck E. Myers, James Dooley and Kevin Manthei scored the game.
